info.name: Improved style for Omg! Ubuntu! + quirk remover
info.description:
This style fixes a few longstanding problems with the otherwise great website omgubuntu.co.uk. Mainly, it removes the large scrolling banner and eliminates those gigantic blockquotes. It also removes a few other annoying quirks. 

Hope this helps those who can't stand visual quirks. Hopefully I'll have time to keep this updated. :-)
info.additionalInfo:
0.1 Initial Release
Original release, removes those big blockquotes and scrolling panel.

0.2 New Features
Get rid of a few more visual quirks, including 
* the margin at the top
* the left margin on the comments and body.

0.3.0 Revert font and add changelog
Revert to the old font is now WIP, and will be considered final if it works properly.
Also, the changelog is now added to the userstyles page.

0.3.1 Fix bugs and remove text-transform
Banner looks better when text is not uppercase, so we change it.
We messed up the formatting a little with the last release, so this fixes it.

0.3.2 Fix text-transform properly
Didn't work correctly last time because of inheritance.

0.3.3 Change font-size on banner
The font looks too small after removing the "all-caps".

0.4.0 Major repair after OMG edit
OmgUbuntu seems to be monkeying with their style. This update fixes a major incompatibility.

0.4.1 Fix minor bug in "share" bar
Seems to be caused by our layout fixes.

0.4.2 Fix the font in the sidebar
Don't know if this bug is new, but the font in the sidebar isn't correct. This update fixes it.

0.4.3 Repair top padding
OMG! edits messed up the padding on the top of the content section.

0.4.4 Repair top padding and improve "recent comments"
With or without the style, the recent comment section is ugly. Fix it.
Fix the top padding again.

0.4.5 Improve padding appearance
Make the left side have the same height as the right.
